thread.title: BRIEF-Micro Focus Intl says shareholder Wizard to sell 4 pct stake
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Micro Focus Intl says shareholder Wizard to sell 4 pct stake | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Micro Focus Intl says shareholder Wizard to sell 4 pct stake
text:
Oct 23 Micro Focus International Plc
* Wizard announces its intention to sell approximately 8.5 million ordinary shares ( "placing shares") in micro focus
* Placing shares represent approximately 4% of company's issued share capital Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By London Bureau)
